mapper.select:
SELECT SEQ, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE, VIEW_CNT, USEYN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, SEQ, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE, VIEW_CNT, USEYN FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_STUDY ORDER BY SEQ DESC)) WHERE 1=1
AND REG_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BOARD_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND (BOARD_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_STUDY (SEQ, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE, VIEW_CNT, USEYN) VALUES ((SEQ.NEXTVAL+1), #{memName} , #{memId}, #{title}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_STUDY SET VIEW_CNT = NVL(VIEW_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
